30 Days of Web Development // My Experience




Event was well organised and will be one of the stepping stones to become a full stack developer. In these 30 days I learnt github, hosting a website(had no clue about this), Javascript(basics), flexbox, bootstrap. The resources provided will be of great help in future too and most importantly the live sessions on back-end was superb. Quizzes on skillenza were way too helpful. Thanks to the whole team for coordinating with us and solving all the doubts asked on discord 😀.
